price: Aksine Allah, onu kendi katına yükseltti. Allah, Aziz'dir, Hakim'dir.
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
